title: Changewar
description: CHANGEWARIt is happening right now: the war through Time. The battleground is the eternal present. The objective is to alter the past. And the goal is to seize control of the future. The warriors are ordinary people, like yourself...Contents:Try and Change the PastThe Oldest SoldierDamnation MorningWhen the Change-Winds BlowKnight to MoveA Deskful of GirlsNo Great Magic
author: Fritz Leiber
